name: WORDZILLA
description:
#ChainLetterJam entry.  I was nominated by Simpathey's game "WORD FALL"

Instructions:

You are WORDZILLA. 

The letters in your name are important.

Try not to fall off the platform.

If you experience trouble with the WebGL version, please give the download version a try.

Music by Eric Matya

https://soundimage.org/
